message.content:
Questions:
1. Can you provide the sources or references for the win-loss records of the NBA teams mentioned, including the specific data for the San Antonio Spurs, Charlotte Hornets, Boston Celtics, and Sacramento Kings as of the end of the 2016-17 NBA season?
2. How was the win-loss record percentage calculated for each team, and what methodology was used to determine the rankings?
3. What criteria were used to differentiate between wins and losses recorded in the NBA versus the American Basketball Association (ABA) for the purpose of this ranking?
4. Can you clarify the timeframe or specific season during which the Boston Celtics recorded the most wins and played the most games, and when the Sacramento Kings recorded the most losses?
